text: Wheelchair basketball at the 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held at two venues: Musashino Forest Sports Plaza for group stage rounds and Ariake Arena for finals. ==Qualifying== There will be 12 qualified men's teams and 10 qualified women's teams. ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Means of qualification !! Date !! Venue !! Berths !! Total || || || align="center"| 12 || |} ===Women=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Means of qualification !! Date !! Venue !! Berths !!
